entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
